sentences.en: I depended on his companionship and on his judgment.
sentences.cn: 我依赖他的陪伴和他的判断。

sentences.en: Third, we typically find social companionship supportive.
sentences.cn: 第三，我们通常会发现社交陪伴是有益的。

sentences.en: Besides providing mere companionship, pets invite us to love and be loved.
sentences.cn: 宠物除了提供单纯的陪伴外，还邀请我们去爱和被爱。
